full_text: This isn't me being a hater, but how do you debut a player like Simmons in the playoffs? It seems very challenging https://t.co/XxocyDii3P
Do NBA writers even have a consensus on which conference was tougher? Suns and Grizz were the two best teams all year but I think the top 5 in the East being so close made it a tougher conference.
